bibl.title: Testament of Solomon: Addendum to P.Rain.Cent. 39.
bibl.note: P. Rainer Cent. 39 (= M.-P.3 2038; van Haelst 570; LDAB 6183). P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 21390 (containing only five letters) belongs to the same rotulus. Provenance unknown, 2nd h. 6th c. / early 7th c.
bibl.seg: Robert Daniel, Testament of Solomon: Addendum to P.Rain.Cent. 39.

P. Rainer Cent. 39 (= M.-P.3 2038; van Haelst 570; LDAB 6183). P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 21390 (containing only five letters) belongs to the same rotulus. Provenance unknown, 2nd h. 6th c. / early 7th c.
